title: Fake books (djvu)
description:
Fake books
==========
A fake book is a collection of musical lead sheets intended to help a
performer quickly learn new songs. Each song in a fake book contains
the melody line, basic chords, and lyrics - the minimal information
needed by a musician to make an impromptu arrangement of a song,
or "fake it." (wikipedia)

 * The books contains mostly Jazz and Blues tunes
 * You can use any instrument playing this, since this is only the notes

Contents
========
Anthologie Des Grilles De Jazz.djvu
Bill Evans Fake Book.djvu
Colorado Cookbook.djvu
Cuban Fake Book.djvu
Hal Leonard Real Book.djvu
Jazz Fake Book.djvu
Jazz LTD.djvu
Library of Musicians Jazz.djvu
New Real Book 1.djvu
New Real Book 2.djvu
New Real Book 3.djvu
Real Book 1.djvu
Real Book 2.djvu
Real Book 3.djvu
Real Book Of Blues.djvu
Standards Real Book.djvu
The Book.djvu
The Other Book.djvu

The content is taken from a torrent found on this site, containing a rar
with png files on it. It was quite unwieldy and large, so I converted
it to djvu which is a better file format for scanned books. Original torrent
was 628MB and this should be something like 287MB with the same quality.
You'll need a djvu viewer if running Windows (Linux should have it built in).

Viewer:
http://www.celartem.com/en/download/djvu.asp

Original torrent:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3409988/The_Ultimate_Fake_Book_(8500__Jazz_Sheets)
